pitchfork.name: pitchfork
pitchfork.description: A humble farmer's tool, now repurposed as a weapon of war.

ProcMessageOnStepOn.text: To wait one turn, press 5 on the keypad or backspace. To rest and recover hit points, press shift-5 or shift-backspace to wait 50 turns.
To descend to the next area, press the > key (shift-period).  To return, press the < key.

misc.corpse.name: generic corpse (error)
misc.corpse.description: The body of a fallen creature.

unique.feature.aurex.forge.name: forge
unique.feature.aurex.forge.description: A divine forge, on which the Fultams forge the tools of the divine.

pc.avatar.name: yourself
pc.avatar.description: You are an avatar of the God of Heroes, sent from on high to reclaim your prior glory.

pc.deity.name: yourself
pc.deity.description: You are the revived God of Heroes, a stranger in this place. What will you make of this shattered multiverse?

pc.farmboy.name: Mortal Farmboy
pc.farmboy.description: You are but a hapless farmboy. Were it not for the goblin invasion, you might be consigned to a lifetime of obscurity. But you are strong of body, and a voice is calling you to do what must be done.

unique.intro.farmerhusband.name: your father
unique.intro.farmerhusband.description: Your parents are hard-working farmers who keep to themselves. When the goblins landed from the acid sea, their farm was in the way, and now they are in danger of losing their land and their lives.

unique.intro.farmerwife.name: your mother
unique.intro.farmerwife.description: Your parents are hard-working farmers who keep to themselves. When the goblins landed from the acid sea, their farm was in the way, and now they are in danger of losing their land and their lives.
